reviewText: This is a very specialized book about a very specialized "marque" so will have limited appeal - other than to Classic British Sport Car aficionados.
Despite a claim that the DVD would play in all regions, the DVD would not play on my US machine. Returned it for full refund.
I enjoyed this  video.  I had to use my computer to watch it.  I did not read the info very well.  But I really injoyed it
